programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep219
programme.desc: Man Ray Returns - When Man Ray rents Squidward's house for the weekend, it's up to SpongeBob and Patrick to stop his evil vacation!

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep526
programme.desc: The Tour - The Chipmunks can't wait to go on a World tour until Theodore and Alvin realize what they'll be leaving behind.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep522
programme.desc: A Knight's Tail / Dreambomber - When Eleanor discovers there are no female knights, she hides in a suit of armor and enters a knight competition. // Alvin is having the best dreams of his life, until Theodore subconsciously invades them.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep523
programme.desc: The Lifeguard / Scarecrowner - When Alvin and Eleanor train to be lifeguards, Theodore is passed over but later manages to save the day. // When Miss Croner's prized cherries go missing, she suspects crows - but could it be chipmunks?

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep261
programme.desc: Lighthouse Louie / Hiccup Plague - SpongeBob cleans out the boating school lighthouse, where he finds a cute but inconvenient companion. // No one in Bikini Bottom is safe from a case of contagious hiccups.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Little Patscals / The Pre-Historic Patrick Star Show - Patrick learns what GrandPat's childhood was like. // Cave Pat hosts a show with his cave family.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep246
programme.desc: Plankton's Old Chum / Stormy Weather - Where Plankton usually dumps his rotten chum is too full, so he tricks SpongeBob into hiding it around the city. // SpongeBob befriends a small storm cloud, but has to protect it from a crazed weather man.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep214
programme.desc: Patrick's Coupon - Patrick has a coupon for free ice cream, but he'll have to get to the store if he wants to use it!

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Taste of Defeat / Scaredy Squirrel - Plankton discovers competition in Narlene's backwoods restaurant. // Sandy spends a night at the Trawler cabin.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep608
programme.desc: Dine and Bash / Sofa, So Good - After failing to make Chef Guy Grazer a meal on his show, the kids try to erase the footage before it airs. // The kids search all over Royal Woods to find the missing furniture they left outside while cleaning.

programme.title: The Loud House S07 Ep703
programme.desc: Candy Crushed / Master of Delusion - Lola struggles to dampen her sweet tooth when mom challenges her to go an entire week without sugar. // Lincoln strives to impress the Amazing Brailster when he's chosen to be his assistant at the Illusion Chateau.

programme.title: The Loud House S07 Ep704
programme.desc: Bye, Bye, Birthday / Tough Guise - Tired of the yearly cheer surrounding her birthday, Lucy casts a spell so her family will forget what day it is. // When Zach is given detention, Rusty and the rest of their friends try to toughen up him up so he'll fit in.

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep124
programme.desc: The Battle of Witwicky - The truth about the Terrans is revealed as the Malto family makes a last stand against Croft and her sinister forces within G.H.O.S.T.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep111
programme.desc: X Marks the Pot / Patrick's Alley - A classic villain returns to his former lair, only to find the Star Family inhabiting it. // The Patrick Show rebrands for a younger audience.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep228
programme.desc: Fun-Sized Friends / Grandmum's the Word - SpongeBob and Patrick exchange tiny living versions of themselves. It's a whole hunk of homunculus fun! // Plankton tells his Grandma that he owns the Krusty Krab, but must keep the lie going when she comes to visit.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep239
programme.desc: The Grill is Gone - When a gang of kids steals the Krusty Krab's grill, SpongeBob and Mr. Krabs go to extreme lengths to win it back.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep262
programme.desc: A Cabin in the Kelp / The Hankering - The Gal Pals take Pearl to a cabin in the woods for a weekend of silly pranks. // Mr. Krabs has a secret taste for something surprising.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Guilt Trip - Ronnie Anne and her primos try to win Maria a trip around the world.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep316
programme.desc: The Wurst Job / The Sound of Meddle - Ronnie Anne lands the internship of a lifetime with Bruno, but will she be able to hang? // Dreaming of DJ-ing at the Gatos halftime show, Carl goes undercover with Alexis and the school band!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Alpaca Lies / Rocket Plan - Ronnie Anne and Bobby have to deal with an old friend of Arturo's-Al the Alpaca, but Al has it out for the kids. // Abuelo helps CJ build a rocket, but when things aren't going well, Abuelo tells a little fib to preserve CJ's feelings.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep319
programme.desc: The Odd Father / Long Shot - Carlos has to choose Carlitos' Padrino in time for his Christening, but will he make the right call? // Carlota needs a PE credit in order to graduate, so she and Ronnie Anne set out to find the right sport for her.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep226
programme.desc: Chatterbox Gary / Don't Feed the Clowns - Gary has a pet translation collar, and he's talking up a storm. Everyone loves it... except for Squidward! // When a small clown gets left behind by the circus, SpongeBob takes the hapless harlequin under his wing.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep227
programme.desc: Drive Happy / Old Man Patrick - SpongeBob can't drive, but you don't need a license to operate a self-driving car! // Patrick thinks he's an old man, so it's up to SpongeBob to remind him how much fun being a kid can be!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep228
programme.desc: Fun-Sized Friends / Grandmum's the Word - SpongeBob and Patrick exchange tiny living versions of themselves. It's a whole hunk of homunculus fun! // Plankton tells his Grandma that he owns the Krusty Krab, but must keep the lie going when she comes to visit.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep229
programme.desc: Doodle Dimension / Moving Bubble Bass - SpongeBob and Patrick become trapped in an alternate dimension where anything they draw comes to life. // SpongeBob and Patrick help Bubble Bass move out of his mother's basement.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Home Ecch! / Fun & Done! - Squidina hosts a television show to pass a home economics class. // Patrick and SpongeBob try to unlock a dull child's imagination.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Little Patscals - Patrick learns what GrandPat's childhood was like.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Shifu's Ex - When Shifu's ex-girlfriend, Mei Ling, visits the Jade Palace, Po decides to try and get them back together, despite the fact Mei Ling is now Shifu's most hated enemy.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Shoot the Messenger - Po and Tigress must track down and stop a messenger from delivering a scroll that could thrust China into all-out war!

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S03 Ep315
programme.desc: The Boiling Rock Part 2 - This episode is continuing the jailbreak from the previous episode. Sokka, Hakoda, Zuko and Suki form a new escape plan, but it is complicated by the arrival of Princess Azula.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Tunnel of Love - When a sneeze from Rico causes the underground tunnel system beneath the zoo to rupture Skipper calls in 4 beavers to fix the situation.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Feline Fervor / Action Reaction - King Julien is literally bounced out of his kingdom and onto the New York streets. // Skipper is forced to live his worst nightmare when hes doused with Inflatium and stress causes him to blow up like a balloon.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep305
